Uses of Package
org.treetank.api

  • Packages that use org.treetank.api 
    Package Description
    org.treetank.access
    Access to Treetank
    org.treetank.access.conf
    Configuration ofTreetank
    org.treetank.api
    TreeTank API This package contains the public TreeTank API.
    org.treetank.io.berkeley
    Implementation for the BerkeleyDB as the backend.
    org.treetank.io.combined  
    org.treetank.io.jclouds  
    org.treetank.log
    Implementation for the log.
    org.treetank.page
    Page Layer for Treetank
  • Classes in org.treetank.api used by org.treetank.access 
    Class and Description
    INode
    Overall INode-Interface for the interaction with the page-layer.
    IPageReadTrx
    Read-Transaction of a page ensuring read-only access to any pages.
    IPageWriteTrx
    Write-Transaction of a page ensuring read- and write access to any pages.
    ISession
    Each IStorage contains multiple resources.
    IStorage
    This interface describes storage-instances handled by Treetank.
  • Classes in org.treetank.api used by org.treetank.access.conf 
    Class and Description
    IMetaEntryFactory
    Creating MetaEntries based on the implementation and the bundle.
    INodeFactory
    Factory to generate nodes out of raw data.
  • Classes in org.treetank.api used by org.treetank.api 
    Class and Description
    IMetaEntry
    All entries in the MetaPage must implement this interface for guaranteeing serialization.
    INode
    Overall INode-Interface for the interaction with the page-layer.
    IPageReadTrx
    Read-Transaction of a page ensuring read-only access to any pages.
    IPageWriteTrx
    Write-Transaction of a page ensuring read- and write access to any pages.
    ISession
    Each IStorage contains multiple resources.
